title: Need to ID the font Muscle & Fitness magazine uses
content:
Need help identifying the font used for **"YOUR ULTIMATE SOURCE FOR TRAINING & NUTRITION"**.

Thank u in advance!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140517152856im_/http:/typophile.com/files/logo_6091.jpg)
author: ozi

comments.content:
It's a bit small, but sure is reminiscent of Officina:  
 [http://new.myfonts.com/fonts/itc/officina-sans/](http://web.archive.org/web/20140517152856/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/itc/officina-sans/ "http://new.myfonts.com/fonts/itc/officina-sans/")  
Maybe the Medium Italic?  
But it's hard to say for certain without a larger sample.
Yes, you're right. Most probably Bold Italic though, but thanks a lot!
looks like eurostile squished a tiny bit horizontally and emboldened . or whatnot. looks like a font that would be on the side of a racecar. that doesnt help you i know ha.
